conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for staying prepared to move quickly.

1) Timing: yes—our intention is to complete close-out by the end of the next round. Once that close-out is complete, we expect to make the “reopen or not” decision immediately (i.e., end of next round or, at the latest, early in the following round depending on when the final confirmations land).

2) Checklist (so you can prepare in advance): if we do reopen and invite you to proceed, we would typically request:
- Child’s ID details (passport/birth certificate) and proof of address
- Parent/guardian ID
- Emergency contacts and authorized pickup list
- Immunization/health information (and any allergy/medical plan if applicable)
- Completed enrollment/consent forms (we would send the specific forms)
- Deposit/first payment instructions (amount and payment method would be specified in the invitation email; usually bank transfer/card where available)

If we reopen, we will send a single email with the exact forms, payment amount/method, and the same-day deadline for confirming acceptance.

Until we formally reopen, we can’t initiate enrollment steps or commit the place in advance, but I appreciate your readiness to respond quickly if invited.

Kind regards,
Nursery_B Admissions
